titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Commissioners of the General Assembly to the Kings Majesty their declaration sent to the Parliament of England : their letter to some brethren of the ministry there, and their commission to their brother Master Alexander Henderson, January 1643.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

notesStmt.note: Entry for S1244 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
